alert.note: Alert for Central Tularosa Basin; West Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 2:44PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Otero County through 315 PM MDT... At 244 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near La Luz, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tularosa, Alamogordo and La Luz. This includes Highway 54 in New Mexico between mile markers 70 and 84. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Tularosa Basin; West Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet
